title: this is one of the most horirble patches in history
body: I can't find anything to complain about

replies.body:
Should have put this in M&G. Posting it to gameplay is just gonna garner a bunch of hate from salty folks.

That aside, funny post +1

No, no.

This is *serious* stuff, man.

Serious stuff.

No messing around.

Serious.

Seriouz buzinez

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

But he *did* put it in M&G.

https://imgur.com/bkeSTpq.jpg?noredirect

yeah, but the gameplay section is a joke.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/657/039/7fa.jpg

{{champion:75}}{{champion:19}}{{champion:14}} didn't get nerfed.

That's one reason to complain about.

nasus is fine just deny minions and play defensevly aften 6
warwick is slightly above average because of pta buffs
and sion with comet is just a ~~ranged~~ inferior  to grasp*(edited) that only deals something early
Warwick was at a 54% wr and 8% play rate before this patch. The fact that they nerfed Xin b/c of the pta buffs but not WW is probably the only issue I have with this patch

they probably didnt know that most people take pta on warwick and thought that it will be fine
it isnt fine

ya it isnt haha, and that's definitely something they should know in the first place.

I'm not gonna raise hell over it though, it's just an issue I have with the patch notes

Xin has a lot more damage in his kit and the buff to press the attack is great for people like xin using the damage proc to kill you. 

Warwick is more team oriented than xin and the reason pta was so strong on warwick was the extra 12% damage enemies would take after the proc. Since that was reduced it hurt situations where you fight with your allies.
Please nerf Warwick but also fix his frustrating W bugs.

No nerfs for {{champion:8}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:63}}. They also completely nerfed {{champion:142}} into the ground unnecessarily. She already had a low win rate, now I believe she is sub 40%. Congrats all you skill-less complainers, you nerfed a perfectly fine champion into oblivion.

"Skill-less complainers"

At least it takes some brain to type a complaint, not like your precious Zoe who just hit her bubble and got a free nuke out of it.
Out of the fog of war farther range than your ward can see
so you didn't play during old AP nidalee era
More like Zoe is giving people PTSD.

> Free nuke out of it.

Lol

_Gets hit by bubble
Opens Shop because you're already dead_

I don't even play Zoe. I'm a support main who plays top as an off role. I played her for like 15 matches because she was fun. I never one shot someone (other than bots). I'm horrible and landing skill shots. 

Like honestly, grow a pair and learn to dodge a skill shot. Play a diver, assassin, tank, and run her down. Zoe had plenty of counter play. Now you can just laugh as her Q heals you instead of damages you.

Her EQ combo still does plenty of damage.  It just is now extremely unlikely to ever get 1 shot by her combo.  Which means you can then back off and heal up.

The big thing that dumpstered her is the complete loss of her Waveclear.   She can barely kill minions now that her Q doesn't apply her passive to multiple targets (AKA the minions) anymore, and more of her Q damage was pushed into said passive as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Steelflame,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YPqR9jQ2,comment-id=0010000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-23T21:04:00.505+0000)
>
> Her EQ combo still does plenty of damage.  It just is now extremely unlikely to ever get 1 shot by her combo.  Which means you can then back off and heal up.
> 
> The big thing that dumpstered her is the complete loss of her Waveclear.   She can barely kill minions now that her Q doesn't apply her passive to multiple targets (AKA the minions) anymore, and more of her Q damage was pushed into said passive as well.

If they have some form of MR it doesn't if they take cleanse, QQS or have minion/another team mate to block you won't get it off. Which is reflective in the data.

W nerf good
P change good
E nerf good

and they should of stopped there

the Q nerf was over the top, especially the level of nerf it took.

Mhm. The Q nerf hit Zoe really hard. W nerf/change was solid, and I agree completely with the E changes/nerf as well. But smashing Zoe's MAIN source (we're talking like 85-90% of her damage) was crazy.
Well done sir, upvoted as deserved.

I'm sad that Morello's other passive no longer exists. The one that gave you mana back on a kill or assist. Rip aram :(

The changes were a step in the right direction, but I'd still like more mana regen options. Right now I feel like we can only buy Archangels for that choice?

> [{quoted}](name=P0IS0N IVY,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YPqR9jQ2,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2018-02-23T21:29:28.802+0000)
>
> I'm sad that Morello's other passive no longer exists. The one that gave you mana back on a kill or assist. Rip aram :(
> 
> The changes were a step in the right direction, but I'd still like more mana regen options. Right now I feel like we can only buy Archangels for that choice?

You forgot {{item:3285}}{{item:3027}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3030}}
Actually, you forgot that those don't give mana regen :P
other than the removal of trackers knife.. this patch was great..
rip lee
That was a good change.

I agree.  Unlike the last time they obliterated vision, which was the removal of the upgraded yellow trinket we had back in S4(?), Tracker's Knife was legitimately game-warping at a competitive level.  Every single jungler took it by the end.  I'd rather junglers _not_ be balanced around having a sightstone.
But they removed sightstone too didn't they? It's just on the support items now. Now it just falls further onto the support to ward
I mean, Zoe, last I heard, hit **41%** for her winrate. There's gonna be a hot fix for certain, and that'll be followed by salty idiots, who you *can* complain about.

Zoe's winrate has never been above 50% from what i can remember. she's getting nerfed purely because of crybabies. the only nerfs that were needed was the gunblade tp thing dropping from minions, and the bubble changes were fine. other than that they're just making her unplayable.

Well, I think the TP removal early on was probably good as well. Because it really sucked (from the few games I played of her) when your first drop from it was TP, instead of anything that'd help you in lane.

TP is what had the most raw impact though in lane.  You get it?  You get to free recall and TP back in with an item advantage without using an actual summoner cooldown.  It was pretty much a free full mana/health restore + Ornn's passive as a RNG drop.

> [{quoted}](name=Rysophage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YPqR9jQ2,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-23T18:17:45.929+0000)
>
> Zoe's winrate has never been above 50% from what i can remember. she's getting nerfed purely because of crybabies. the only nerfs that were needed was the gunblade tp thing dropping from minions, and the bubble changes were fine. other than that they're just making her unplayable.

Riot doesn't make game decisions for 100m players based on a couple dozen salty folks on the boards.  They use actual stats.  Zoe had Lulu-of-last-Spring ban rates since she was released.  THAT'S why she has been nerfed over and over and finally enough that it's noticeable.

> [{quoted}](name=Anastaecia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YPqR9jQ2,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2018-02-23T18:36:48.386+0000)
>
> Riot doesn't make game decisions for 100m players based on a couple dozen salty folks on the boards.  They use actual stats.  Zoe had Lulu-of-last-Spring ban rates since she was released.  THAT'S why she has been nerfed over and over and finally enough that it's noticeable.

Riot themselves said her WR was good... did you watch their patch rundown? She was nerfed not because she OP, she was nerfed because she was unfun to play against, Riots words.

medler wanted to leave zoe like that even if they dumpster her
imo they should have nerfed obly her e

Agreed. The E nerfs were warranted and good (it allowed for more outplay rather than wasting cleanse or QSS). Now Zoe is quite literally a garbage tier champion. 

I personally feel that having a one-shot champion is fine. There are many others in league. The only stipulation should require Zoe to land her sleepy trouble bubble. When Zoe has 90% of her damage in skill shots, if you're getting hit by those things it is your fault.
She was the only true one shot champ though... that is spam-able....

Rengar one shots with crit from ultimate. Syndra one shots from R, and that's a fucking click on nuke. Kha'Zix isolated Q + auto = death. Kayn W + Auto (and often times just one auto attack is enough to kill an ADC). 

There are many "one shot" type champions with even less counter play than Zoe had. Syndra and pre-rework talon and rengar are the reasons I stopped playing adc after S4, It was miserable being one shot with absolutely nothing I can do. 

With Zoe there has always been counter play, and she has a very visible pattern. All you have to do is 1.) Not face check. 2.) Keep vision up and tabs on Zoe. 3.) Have decent mobility. 4.) Use your free zhonyas 5.) Be with your teammates. 

In all, it is not difficult to play around most champions. I just don't understand why players bitch about Zoe when champions like {{champion:34}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:8}} all exist.
At first I was like “how tf did this get to the top of the Boards?” {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
{{item:3094}} {{item:3087}} not being nerfing yet still would be an easy easy one.

You got me.

You got me good.

Only things I have a problem with.

1:

The shyvana and xin zhao nerfs were too harsh in comparison to the buffs given to press the attack.

2:

Twitch nerfs were too harsh because Riot thought he would now take PTA, but he doesn't so now he just ends up being a shit tier champ.

3:

Why the fuck does GLP lose pretty much all of its important stats basically making Aurelion unviable?

4: 

Some of the incredibly oppressive champions were not touched at all
(Varus, Taric, Vladimir)

5:

Lee sin is now officially a dead champion. With the removal of trackers knife, we won't be seeing him ever again or until riot can figure out a substitution.
whats GLP?
Vlad is now much easier to counter as a mage, heavily hitting him, and Aurelion has the highest winrate in the game.  He is not unviable.
